stories.original_headline: A hidden T cell switch could make cancer immunotherapy work for more people
stories.original_summary: Scientists have discovered that T cell receptors activate through a hidden spring-like motion that had never been seen before. This breakthrough may help explain why immunotherapy works for some cancers and how it could be improved for others.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Secret to Enhanced Healing Enchantments
stories.fantasy_story: The revered Alchemists' Guild has unearthed a wondrous secret within the body's tiny guardian spirits. They discovered these spirits activate with a hidden, spring-like motion. This knowledge promises to improve powerful healing enchantments, helping more folk overcome creeping maladies.
